title: Vehicle of Interest Identified in Shooting of 4 People
content:
Columbia, SC (WLTX) - Columbia police have identified a vehicle of interest in a recent shooting that left four men injured.
The shooting took place on August 6 at 1505 Garden Plaza near McDuffie Avenue. Police haven't released many details of what they think happened on that night, but they do believe the crime is gang-related.
The vehicle officers are searching for is a silver or gray Dodge Magnum.
Anyone with information should call Crimestoppers at 1-888-CRIME-SC, or e-mail a tip in to www.midlandscrimestoppers.com. You can also text information in by texting "TIPSC" plus your message to CRIMES (274637). Either way you choose, your identity will remain anonymous, and you could be eligible for a cash reward.
